DataError_MultiUser.Description: There are multiple user with same username in database

DataError_WrongPassword.Description: The password is wrong for provideed username

DataError_WrongUserName.Description: The provided username is not registered

DataError_AlreadyUser.Description: The provided username is already registered

DataError_UserCreation.Description: Unable to create user due to unknown error

ValidationError_SQLProtection.Description: Unable to apply SQL Injection Protection measures

ValidationError_BadValue.Description: Data Validation experienced the bad value in check
